description:
A recollection video of Takanashi Kiara, one of the characters in the hololive English new project "ENigmatic Recollection"

◆Cast
Takanashi Kiara: Takanashi Kiara
https://www.youtube.com/@TakanashiKiara
https://twitter.com/takanashikiara

◆Hashtag
#ENreco

◆Introduction
Once upon a time, the girls are summoned to the mysterious Kingdom of Libestal.
Unable to remember anything from before their arrival, they become entangled in the kingdom's conflicts.
The girls are asked to defend the land from looming danger and are thusly entrusted with the kingdom's fate.

Ominous creatures----
ENigmatic stories lost within the kingdom-----
What fate awaits them at the end of it all? 

Expect a grand tale of adventure and valor starring all 19 hololive English members!

◆What is "ENigmatic Recollection"?
It is a collection of stories in which the members of hololive English play a part.
Through streams, animations, and songs wrought anew, immerse yourself in fresh narratives woven from myriad realms beyond.

◆ENigmatic Recollection Official 3D Program
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vo0Xw_Kg98A

◆Credit
Storyboard: Reina Yamazaki
Key Animation: Minori Homura
3DCG Director: Hiroshi Sakamoto
3DCG Layout: Kento Tada / Akaishi
3DCG Animation: Kento Tada / Akaishi / Takuya Takahashi / Hitomi Yamamoto
Character Retouch: Haruna Ishii
Modeling Artist: Yusuke Kimura / Chikou Ri
Art DIrecter: Takayuki Shinohara
Background Artist: Yuki Ikenoue / Kenta Masuda / Ayako Iwanaga / Hiromi Kamiyama / Ayami Yoshida
Compositer: Yuki Uemura / LEE CHI-HAO
Sound Engineer: Etsuko Ichikawa
Director: Yuki Miyamura
Production Management: Shohei Konumano

Follow the official hololive English accounts!
▶Official YouTube channel:  @hololiveEnglish 
▶Official X: https://twitter.com/hololive_En
▶Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hololivetv/
▶Official Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Hololive/

▶Request from hololive production to underage viewers
Please search for [Request To Minors] or click on the link below, to read it and enjoy the video
https://hololivepro.com/en/request-to-minors/

Translations, Captions: lyger, T-chan
title: 【#ENreco】Recollection - Takanashi Kiara【Animation】
